{"step_by_step_thinking": "Adenosine signaling is a complex process that involves various receptors and enzymes. It has been found to play a role in many physiological and pathological processes, including inflammation, immune responses, and tumor progression. Several studies have shown that adenosine signaling can influence the behavior of cancer cells and the tumor microenvironment, affecting cancer progression and response to therapy. Therefore, it can be considered as a prognostic factor for cancer outcome.", "answer_choice": "A"}
